Mercury::ShutdownSafeReplyMessageHandler

Mercury::ShutdownSafeReplyMessageHandler Class Reference

This class implements ReplyMessageHandler and can be used by handlers with a handleException method that is safe to call while shutting down. More...

Public Member Functions

virtual void handleShuttingDown (const NubException &exception, void *arg)

Detailed Description

This class implements ReplyMessageHandler and can be used by handlers with a handleException method that is safe to call while shutting down.
